title: Waist-to-Hip Ratio Calculator | Health and Fitness Body Metrics

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Inline: $\\mathrm{WHR} = \\dfrac{W}{H}$ Where $W$ is waist circumference and $H$ is hip circumference, both in the same unit (cm or in).
